posts.post_content: I am looking for a lower end raw or graded 39-46 Ted Williams Salutation Exhibit card.
Anybody have an extra one for sale?
I have one I think in G-VG+ for $30.
I don't think Teddy ballgame played in the 19th century.  Might want to move this to the correct section.  Best of luck

[quote name="sycks22" post=1388073]I don't think Teddy ballgame played in the 19th century.  Might want to move this to the correct section.  Best of luck[/QUOTE]

Sorry I thought Exhibits are considered the same as postcards because of their size.
